definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: In leading Sunday service, and Bible study and small groups.
sentences.chinese: 曾帶領主日崇拜聚會和查經班，及小組事工。

sentences.english: Altogether the word "heart" occurs seven times in the prayers and readings of the Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 這個字在該主日的讀經和禱文，一共出現了七次。

sentences.english: This guy named John says, "I was on the Island of Patmos. I was in--the Lord's Day.
sentences.chinese: 這個叫約翰的人說，“我來自拔摩島，主日那天。

sentences.english: She was the belle of her Sunday School class.
sentences.chinese: 在主日學校她是她們班的班花。

sentences.english: We thank Rev. Tim Wong's preaching at our church today.
sentences.chinese: 多謝黃志強牧師於今主日在本會證道。

sentences.english: Attention shall be directed to them in the worship services preceding the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 在召開大會之前，需在主日崇拜中通知會衆。

sentences.english: Every Sunday people come to Church to worship the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 每個主日，大家都會來教會敬拜主。
哥林多前書13章，主日學校教育很成功。

sentences.english: Is it a mortal sin not to participate in Mass on Sundays and holydays of obligation?
sentences.chinese: 主日和當守的瞻禮，不望彌撒，有大罪沒有？

sentences.english: 'Welcome into Membership' ceremony will be held on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 日聖餐主日有歡迎儀式，請與餘何杏輝牧師聯絡安排。

sentences.english: Sunday school was spilling on to the street.
sentences.chinese: 主日學校的孩子紛紛湧上街頭，到處是熙攘的人流。

definition: Holy sacrament/Christian rite (esp. Protestant)/also called 聖事|圣事 by Catholics
silent contemplation/to meditate/to think in silence
